scripts.build: cd hcs_settings && npm run build && npm run delete-target && npm run copy-files && cd .. && tsc
scripts.compile: npm run build && homey app build
scripts.local: cd hcs_settings && npm run build && npm run delete-target && npm run copy-files && cd .. && npx homey app run --remote
scripts.local:release: cd hcs_settings && npm run build && npm run delete-target && npm run copy-files && cd .. && npx homey app install
